channel.title: SOF interface help

item.title: SOF interface help
item.dc:creator: @svrking27 svrking27
item.description:
@svrking27 wrote:

server sided i did everything and it compiles perfectly. but client sided i add this code into Rsinterface.java and i get errorsâ€¦ idk what wrong.
heres code

public static void SquealOfFortune(TextDrawingArea[] tda) { RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(48500); addSprite(48501, 0, "SquealOfFortune/BG"); addHoverButton(48502, "SquealOfFortune/SPRITE", 0, 156, 62, "Open Squeal of Fortune", -1, 48503, 1); addHoveredButton(48503, "SquealOfFortune/SPRITE", 1, 156, 62, 48504); addHoverButton(48505, "SquealOfFortune/SPRITE", 0, 156, 62, "Buy Spins", -1, 48506, 1); addHoveredButton(48506, "SquealOfFortune/SPRITE", 2, 156, 62, 48507); addText(48508, "0", tda, 0, 0xE3CCCF, true, true); setChildren(6, Interface); setBounds(48501, 8, 0, 0, Interface);//326, 276 setBounds(48502, 25, 81, 1, Interface); setBounds(48503, 25, 81, 2, Interface); setBounds(48505, 25, 149, 3, Interface); setBounds(48506, 25, 149, 4, Interface); setBounds(48508, 102, 241, 5, Interface); }
